website_summaries.verdict: The beautifully designed Bowers & Wilkins P3 Series 2 on-ear headphones feature subtle improvements that make them better than ever.
pros: Excellent audio performance with rich, full bass response and well-defined high frequency presence
Detachable cableâships with two cables, one with inline remote
cons: Earpads must be removed to detach cable

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, unfortunate design.
customer_reviews.text: Whilst the sound and build quality are superb, this model has two major flaws. It becomes uncomfortable to wear after about 40 minutes, so it is not so good for watching films. Whilst fairly small in size, the case it comes with is quite bulky and it is not easy to stow the headphones back in the case after use. In fact the larger and more comfortable P5 model folds up into a more compact soft case, which is easier to put into a small briefcase. The P5 is nearly double the price but far more practical.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Gunston

customer_reviews.title: Not the most natural sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look and feel luxurious. I'm not that impressed with the sound though. There is clearly a boost to the upper bass / lower midrange that initially appears to make them pack a real punch and sound impressive. However; what happens is that this 'boost' tends to drown out more intricate elements of the music such as the higher notes of subtle electric guitar and complex percussion. I think they are purley aimed at the younger generation who listen to popular music on mobile devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, good sound stage if bass oriented.
customer_reviews.text: Well first the sound. Yes they are quite bass oriented however I quite like to feel Im in the music and its not distracting or muddy as the mids and highs are well shaped giving the sound stage nice depth and feel. They are beautifully made and feel strong, however the head band pinch is noticeable after wearing for a while, but that being said it also contributes to good earpiece contact which again fully immerses the listener. The price is great and well placed. The only negative is the case doesn't feel that strong but it'll do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so these headphones are expensive but hey what do you expect from Bose? The quality of the sound is excellent, they are clearly well made and stylish and they come in a clam shell case that is ideal for daily use. I have been using these now for a year, traveling regularly and cannot rate them highly enough. An ideal purchase if you are looking for a great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: Tangled
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. The headphone are comfortable enough. It's the wire I don't like it gets very tangled quite easily. I never had this issue with my older Make by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Deadpool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value B&W headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value. Slick style, excellent sound quality, loud volume without much distortion. Couldn't for more at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: A Clockwork Android

customer_reviews.title: Hurts your ears after a while
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the sound, the case, the weight, the clarity.. however they are soooo uncomfortable on the ears. I have a small head and even with me it feels like it's clamping my head after 30mins.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Mulled over getting these for ages but one of the best things i own. Great how they fold away neatly which is great for leaving in bag at work. Great sound quality and look fantastic. Little addendum: right headphone stopped working, sent back and fixed (replaced with new headphones) with no questions or messing around, great aftercare, still sound great, v.happy with this purchase and will buy B&W again when these eventually explode
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, even with a full orchestra
customer_reviews.text: These are neat on-earphones, with outstanding sound quality. They can, however, get unduly tight after a while, but this is mitigated by wearing over a cap.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: sound is spot on. a bit too tight but ok for short periods. very compact and stylish and quite unique design
customer_reviews.author: k.

customer_reviews.title: The wire broke just after the window of return with no excess wear or tear
customer_reviews.text: They were great until the wire broke after 2.5 months with no excess wear or tear. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cans!
customer_reviews.text: Superb! A real quality product, excellent sound and very comfortable. Have previously been disappointed with Senheisers which have lasted no more than two years. The materials feel long-lasting and the carry case is a useful addition. A bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.author: adiephill

customer_reviews.title: B&W P3 series 2
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I anticipated but excellent sound and quality
customer_reviews.author: tiger4.2

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good quality
customer_reviews.text: They look great and produce a clear sound. I would like them louder but that's a personal preference
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but the sound is excellent and they’re comfortable for long periods
customer_reviews.author: T. M. O'malley

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be clearer
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones I find them really comfy the sound is nice and crisp. The only thing is the instructions would have you try to slide the ear pads up to remove them so you can change the cables when in fact they are magnetic
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but become very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but become very uncomfortable. I use these for conference calls on my laptop. After a 60 mins call, I have to revert back to my cheap in-ear Samsung headset since my ears feel like the garbage crushing scene in Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Nasser M Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most uncomfortable headphones I've bought. Overwhelming bass.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most uncomfortable headphones I've bought. You really can't wear them for longwr than 20 minutes at a time. The highs are pretty nice but the bass is overwhelming and the sound is slightly muddy. THey are quite portable but the remote only works with iOS devices. I've sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, however the audio cable that comes with it is so cheap and didn't work from the offset. When I complained they said I had to send the cable back and wait up to 10 days for a replacement. Customer service from Bowers & Wilkins is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Vienna Macleod

customer_reviews.title: wow wow amazing sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought from John Lewis as cheaper ... wow wow amazing sound .... really good
customer_reviews.author: B. Matthews

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins P3 Series 2 On-Ear Headphone, Foldable - Black/aluminium
product_meta.description:
P3 Series 2 deliver natural sounding audio performance and exceptional clarity. All from a light, foldable headphone designed to fit easily into your life.

BOX CONTAINS
Universal and Apple mic and remote cables; Protective hard shell case
feature_bullets: P3 Series 2's drive unit has been designed around its size. It uses a unique damping system to control diaphragm movement so you hear with exceptional precision and big, extended bass.
P3 Series 2 deliver natural sounding audio performance and exceptional clarity. All from a light, foldable headphone designed to fit easily into your life.
P3 Series 2 provides size defying bass and musical dynamics. Breathtaking performance that rivals headphones twice their size.
